reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Engaging lectures and clear explanations. Challenging but fair exams.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Incredible knowledge of the field. Always willing to help students outside of class.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Knowledgeable but sometimes moves too fast through complex topics.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Passionate about the subject. Makes historical events come alive.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Excellent at breaking down complex concepts. Great lab instructor.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Very intelligent but struggles to explain concepts at a beginner level.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Thought-provoking lectures. Encourages class participation and discussion.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Knowledgeable but can be dry at times. Assignments are challenging.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Inspiring teacher. Relates course material to real-world issues effectively.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Passionate about literature. Provides insightful analysis of texts.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Engaging lecturer. Organizes interesting field trips and hands-on projects.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Knowledgeable but can be biased in discussions. Grading is fair.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Vast knowledge of art periods. Lectures are accompanied by excellent visuals.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Challenges students to think critically. Facilitates great class discussions.

reviews.subject: Geology
reviews.review: Knows the subject well but can be disorganized in lecture presentations.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Brings real-world experience to the classroom. Practical assignments.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Fascinating lectures. Encourages students to conduct original research.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Highly skilled musician but struggles to teach effectively to non-music majors.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Clear explanations of complex language concepts. Engaging class activities.

reviews.subject: Astronomy
reviews.review: Passionate about space exploration. Organizes stargazing events for students.
